description:
Remote - This position is fully remote but limited to applicants residing in Alaska, Arizona, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Maine, Missouri, New Jersey, Nevada, North Carolina, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Texas, Washington, and Wyoming.

About Snail Games USA

Snail Games USA is a pioneering video game developer and publisher, known for creating immersive digital entertainment experiences. With a focus on innovation, Snail Games is committed to pushing the boundaries of game design and technology, particularly within the Wuxia genre.

Position

The Team Lead will be responsible for guiding a talented team of developers, designers, and artists in the creation and maintenance of this complex and culturally rich Wuxia game. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of Wuxia culture, game mechanics, and the ability to translate these into a captivating gameplay experience.

Key Responsibilities

Leadership & Management: Oversee the daily operations of the development team, ensuring project milestones are met on time and within budget.

  • Creative Direction: Collaborate closely with creative directors and other stakeholders to maintain the artistic and thematic integrity of the game.
  • Technical Expertise: Provide guidance on technical challenges, leveraging expertise in game development, particularly in Unreal Engine or similar platforms.
  • Mentorship: Foster a collaborative and innovative environment by mentoring junior team members and promoting continuous learning and development.
  • Quality Assurance: Ensure that all aspects of the game meet the highest quality standards, from gameplay mechanics to visual and auditory elements.

Qualifications

  • Experience: Minimum of 5 years in game development with at least 2 years in a leadership role.
  • Technical Skills: Proficiency in Unreal Engine or similar game development platforms.
  • Cultural Knowledge: Strong understanding of Wuxia culture and its application in game design.
  • Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to articulate complex ideas clearly and effectively.
  • Problem-Solving: Strong analytical skills and a creative approach to overcoming technical and logistical challenges.

Salary Range

$80,000 - $120,000 per year Salary is commensurate with experience and includes potential bonuses based on project milestones and overall performance.

Benefits

  • Health Insurance: Comprehensive medical, dental, and vision plans.
  • Retirement Plans: 401(k) with company match.
  • Paid Time Off: Generous PTO policy including vacation days, sick leave, and paid holidays.
  • Professional Development: Opportunities for continued learning and career advancement through workshops and training programs.
